name: Immortal Soul
description:
Scientist made you a beast while trying to make super soldiers. Take your revange back with chaos!

Controls:

  • WASD to move
  • Mouse to look
  • LMB to Attack
  • RMB to throw grenade
  • Left Shift to Sprint
  • C to crouch

Credits

  • Umut Kanıbir:  Coder / Level Designer
  • Mehmet Çetinkaya: 3D Artist
